SELECT t1.* FROM crm_after_sale_product_allot t1 WHERE t1.enabled=1
AND t1.from_product_id in( select product.id FROM crm_product product where product.enabled=1 and product.name like concat('%',#{p.fromProductName},'%') )
AND t1.to_product_id in( select product.id FROM crm_product product where product.enabled=1 and product.name like concat('%',#{p.toProductName},'%') )
and t1.created_date >= #{p.createdDateStart}
and t1.created_date <= #{p.createdDateEnd}
and t1.created_by in( select id from hr_account where login_name like concat('%',#{p.createdBy},'%') and enabled=1 )
and t1.store_id in( select depot.id from crm_depot depot where depot.name like concat('%',#{p.storeName},'%') and depot.enabled=1 )
and t1.from_out_code like concat('%',#{p.fromOutCode},'%')
and t1.to_out_code like concat('%',#{p.toOutCode},'%')
and t1.after_sale_id like concat('%',#{p.afterSaleId},'%')
